choices.name: chc_FSPKG_CXCLA
choices.choiceText: FS/PKG - CXC Los Angeles

choices.name: chc_PRT_CXCCIN
choices.choiceText: PRINT - CXC Cincinnati

choices.choiceText: PRINT - CXC Los Angeles

decisions.description: Determines if Email Messages with Attachments are related to the original Case record
decisions.name: dec_Emails_EmailMessagesRelated
decisions.label: Email Messages Related

decisions.description: Determines if Files are related to the original Case record
decisions.name: dec_Files_FilesRelated
decisions.label: Files Related

decisions.description: Determines if Files (Content Documents) were uploaded by the user in the previous screen
decisions.name: dec_FilesUploaded
decisions.label: Files Uploaded

decisions.description: Determines if the team selected is related to CX, which will result in using a different case creation element since there is no Category selection included in the Flow for this team.
decisions.name: dec_SelectedTeam
decisions.label: Selected Team

decisions.description: Determines which Team was selected in the previous screen
decisions.name: dec_TeamSelected
decisions.label: Team Selected

decisions.description: Determines if the user selected Files in the table on the previous screen
decisions.name: dec_UserSelectedFiles
decisions.label: User Selected Files

Flow.description: Allows teams to create a new related Case for another team from an existing Case <Credit & Collections removed until this team starts using Cases in SFDC>

formulas.description: Checks the length of the list to determine if records are present. Used in a decision element.
formulas.name: fx_ContentDocumentIdsFINAL_LengthCheck_TESTING

formulas.description: Calculates the org hyperlink to be used as a clickable link
formulas.name: fx_Hyperlink

formulas.description: Determines which input to use to store the Category value
formulas.name: fx_Input_Category

formulas.description: Stores text to be used in the Custom Description field on the new related Case
formulas.name: var_CaseDescription
formulas.expression: "This Case was created by another team and assigned to your Queue. See Case Comments and the related Parent Case for additional details."

Flow.label: Case - Create Related Team Case

loops.description: Loops over collection of Content Document IDs
loops.name: loop_ContentDocumentIDs
loops.label: Content Document IDs

loops.description: Loops though the Files retrieved from the Get element
loops.name: lop_Emails_ContentDocumentLinkIDs
loops.label: ContentDocumentLink IDs

loops.description: Loops though the Files retrieved from the Get element
loops.name: lop_Files_ContentDocumentLinkIDs
loops.label: ContentDocumentLink IDs

recordCreates.description: Creates Case Comments record related to the new Case
recordCreates.name: crt_CaseComments
recordCreates.label: Case Comments

recordCreates.description: Creates new related Case record and assigns to the Queue selected in the previous screen. This element is used to create a case for the CostMaint or Collections teams, who require a Category selection (Specialty defaults to 'Non-Order Management').
recordCreates.name: crt_RelatedTeamCase_CostMaintCollections
recordCreates.label: Related Case

recordCreates.description: Creates new related Case record and assigns to the Queue selected in the previous screen. This element is used to create a case only for CX teams since Category is not available for selection.
recordCreates.name: crt_RelatedTeamCase_CX
recordCreates.label: Related Case

recordCreates.description: Creates new related Case record and assigns to the Queue selected in the previous screen. This element is used to create a case for the EPS team who requires an Action Reason selection (Specialty and Category not used).
recordCreates.name: crt_RelatedTeamCase_EPS
recordCreates.label: Related Case

recordCreates.description: Creates new related Case record and assigns to the Queue selected in the previous screen. This element is used to create a case for the TaxOps team, who require a Category selection (Specialty defaults to 'Non-Order Management') and have a Subflow process to add Entitlements/Milestones and determine owner.
recordCreates.name: crt_RelatedTeamCase_TaxOps
recordCreates.label: Related Case

recordLookups.description: Gets the current Case record that invoked the Flow. This element was intentionally placed before the screen to prevent a governor limit error occurring when selecting the previous screen from the second screen UI.
recordLookups.name: get_Case
recordLookups.label: Current Case

recordLookups.description: Gets Emails with Attachments related to the original Case record
recordLookups.name: get_EmailMessage
recordLookups.label: EmailMessage

recordLookups.description: Gets the ContentDocumentLink records that were saved in the collection variable
recordLookups.name: get_Emails_ContentDocumentLinkIDs
recordLookups.label: Content Document Link IDs

recordLookups.description: Gets Files related to the original Case record
recordLookups.name: get_Files_ContentDocumentLinkIDs
recordLookups.label: Files

recordLookups.description: Gets the Queue Id for the team selected
recordLookups.name: get_QID
recordLookups.label: Queue ID

recordLookups.description: Gets additional info for the new related Case
recordLookups.name: get_RelatedCase
recordLookups.label: Related Case

recordLookups.description: Gets the Record Type Id for the team selected
recordLookups.name: get_RTID
recordLookups.label: Case RecordType ID

screens.description: Displays a confirmation that a new related Case was created for another team
screens.name: scn_RelatedCaseConfirmation
screens.label: Confirmation

fields.name: txt_RelatedCaseConfirmation
fields.fieldText:
Related Case# {!get_RelatedCase.CaseNumber} created

﻿

fields.name: txt_RelatedTeamCase1
fields.fieldText: Create a new related case to assign to another team

fields.name: ipt_RelatedTeamCase_SelectTeam
fields.helpText: To find the appropriate CXC Team to assign the related Case, go to the Account record and hover over the 'ANI Primary' to see the CXC Team.

fields.name: txt_RelatedTeamCase2
fields.fieldText: Create a new related case to assign to another team

validationRule.errorMessage: Max field length is 255 characters
Max field length is 4,000 characters

value.stringValue: Select Files from the Original Case to Relate to the New Case

fields.name: txt_RelatedTeamCase3
fields.fieldText: Create a new related case to assign to another team

screens.description: Error screen if selected team is not found
screens.name: scn_RelatedTeamCase_Error
screens.label: Error

fields.name: txt_RelatedTeamCase_Error
fields.fieldText: An error occurred with the team selected. Please contact your Salesforce administrator by creating an incident in Service Now.

variables.description: Stores content document IDs in a record collection to be referenced in the data table in the next screen
variables.name: col_ContentDocumentIdMultipleRecord

variables.description: Stores the final list of IDs of uploaded or selected Files (Content Documents) to be related to the new case
variables.name: col_ContentDocumentIdsFINAL

variables.description: Stores content document ID to add to the record collection
variables.name: col_ContentDocumentIdSingleRecord

variables.description: Stores record variables to Content Document Link collection to be created
variables.name: col_ContentDocumentLinkRecords

variables.description: Collection of files related to the original Case, in addition to files related to emails related to the original case
variables.name: col_RelatedTeamCase_OriginalFiles

variables.description: Stores the Files the user selected to relate to the new case
variables.name: col_UserSelectedFiles

variables.description: Stores the ID for a single ContentDocument record
variables.name: var_ContentDocumentIdSingleText

variables.description: Stores the current assignment values for the Content Document Link to be created
variables.name: var_ContentDocumentRecord

variables.description: Stores the ID of the new related Case
variables.name: var_RelatedCaseId

variables.description: Stores the record type developer name
variables.name: var_SelectedTeam_RTDevName
